*   [About](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)

This website uses cookies

We use cookies to ensure that we give you the best experience on our website. This includes cookies from third party social media websites and advertising cookies that may analyze your use of this site. Click “I Agree” to accept or “Customize” to opt out.

Consent Selection

**Required**

**Functional**

**Analytics**

**Advertising**

[Show details](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)

Details

*   Required 9
    
    These cookies and tracking technologies are required to help our websites work correctly. For example, these cookies allow you to navigate our Website and use essential features, including secure areas and shopping baskets.
    
    *   [Cloudflare 1](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 2](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.cloudflare.com/privacypolicy/ "Cloudflare's privacy policy")
        
        **cf.turnstile.u**Pending
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
    *   [Cookiebot 1](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 3](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.cookiebot.com/goto/privacy-policy/ "Cookiebot's privacy policy")
        
        **CookieConsent**Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 year**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [LinkedIn 2](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 4](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy "LinkedIn's privacy policy")
        
        **bcookie**Used in order to detect spam and improve the website's security.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 year**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
        **li\_gc**Stores the user's cookie consent state for the current domain
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 180 days**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [SharpSpring 1](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 5](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://sharpspring.com/legal/privacy/ "SharpSpring's privacy policy")
        
        **wpEmojiSettingsSupports**This cookie is part of a bundle of cookies which serve the purpose of content delivery and presentation. The cookies keep the correct state of font, blog/picture sliders, color themes and other website settings.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
    *   [Sharpspring 1](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 6](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://sharpspring.com/legal/privacy/ "Sharpspring's privacy policy")
        
        **ts**Necessary for the website security.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
    *   [Vimeo 1](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 7](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://vimeo.com/privacy "Vimeo's privacy policy")
        
        **\_cfuvid**This cookie is a part of the services provided by Cloudflare - Including load-balancing, deliverance of website content and serving DNS connection for website operators.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [sharpspring.com vimeo.com 2](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)
        
        **\_\_cf\_bm \[x2\]**This cookie is used to distinguish between humans and bots. This is beneficial for the website, in order to make valid reports on the use of their website.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 day**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    
*   Functional 6
    
    These cookies and tracking technologies allow our Websites to remember choices you make to give you better functionality and a personalized experience. For example, when you select a specific currency on one of our Websites, we will remember your currency selection when you return.
    
    *   [LinkedIn 1](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 8](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.linkedin.com/legal/privacy-policy "LinkedIn's privacy policy")
        
        **lidc**Registers which server-cluster is serving the visitor. This is used in context with load balancing, in order to optimize user experience.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 day**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [SharpSpring 4](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 9](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://sharpspring.com/legal/privacy/ "SharpSpring's privacy policy")
        
        **QM\_S**Pending
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **QuantumMetricSessionID**Pending
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 day**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
        **QuantumMetricUserID**Pending
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 year**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
        **wistia-video-progress-#**Contains a timestamp for the website’s video-content. This allows the user to resume watching without having to start over, if the user leaves the video or website.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
    *   [Sharpspring 1](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 10](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://sharpspring.com/legal/privacy/ "Sharpspring's privacy policy")
        
        **mov\_id**Pending
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Session**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
    
*   Analytics 21
    
    These cookies and tracking technologies help us understand how customers and visitors interact with our Websites. They provide us with information about areas of our Websites visited, time spent on our Websites, transactions performed, and any error messages you receive. These cookies allow us to improve the performance of our Websites. They may collect your IP address but only for the purpose of identifying general locations of visitors and identifying fraudulent or spam traffic.
    
    *   [Amazon 4](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 11](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.amazon.com/gp/help/customer/display.html/ref=footer_privacy?ie=UTF8&nodeId=468496 "Amazon's privacy policy")

        **snowplowOutQueue\_#\_get.expires**Registers statistical data on users' behaviour on the website. Used for internal analytics by the website operator.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **\_sp\_id.#**Collects data on the user's visits to the website, such as the number of visits, average time spent on the website and what pages have been loaded with the purpose of generating reports for optimising the website content.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 2 years**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
        **\_sp\_ses.#**Used by Snowplow Analytics to track how users are browsing and engaging with a website.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 1 day**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [Optimizely 13](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 12](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://www.optimizely.com/privacy/ "Optimizely's privacy policy")
        
        **#/#$#**Pending
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage

        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **optimizely\_data$#$#$contextual\_mab**Pending
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **optimizely\_data$pending\_events**This cookie is set to make split-tests on the website, which optimizes the website's relevance towards the visitor – the cookie can also be set to improve the visitor's experience on a website.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **optimizelyEndUserId**Used to measure how selected users react to targeted changes to the website's content and functionality, in order to determine what variation is most efficacious in terms of converting users to customers.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 180 days**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
        **optimizelySession**Pending
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 180 days**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    *   [SharpSpring 3](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 13](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://sharpspring.com/legal/privacy/ "SharpSpring's privacy policy")
        
        **QEventChannel**Pending
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage

        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
        **wistia**Used by the website to track the visitor's use of video-content - The cookie roots from Wistia, which provides video-software to websites.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: Persistent**Type**: HTML Local Storage
        
    *   [Vimeo 1](https://sharpspring.com/pricing/#)[Learn more about this provider![Image 14](blob:http://localhost/7c37f61654102a88a9be209f9569ef78)](https://vimeo.com/privacy "Vimeo's privacy policy")
        
        **vuid**Collects data on the user's visits to the website, such as which pages have been read.
        
        **Maximum Storage Duration**: 2 years**Type**: HTTP Cookie
        
    
*   Advertising 42
    
    These cookies and tracking technologies allow us to deliver content, including advertisements, relevant to your specific interests. This content may be delivered on our Websites or on third party websites or services. They allow us to understand and improve the relevancy of our advertisements. They may track personal information, including your IP address.
